2025-12-19PMOFinancial Administration ActAppointment of the Deputy Minister of FinanceAppointment of Nicholas Leswick of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Deputy Minister of Finance, to hold office during pleasure, effective January 12, 2026.N/A
subject: Appointment of the Deputy Minister of Finance
precis: Appointment of Nicholas Leswick of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Deputy Minister of Finance, to hold office during pleasure, effective January 12, 2026.
